info.title: Vincent Registry API
info.description: API for Vincent App, Ability, and Policy Registry

bearerAuth.description: Vincent-issued JWTs must be used for these endpoints.

deploymentStatus.description: Identifies if an application is in development, test, or production.

contactEmail.description: Contact email for the application manager

appUserUrl.description: This should be a landing page for the app.

redirectUris.description: Redirect URIs users can be sent to after signing up for your application (with their JWT token).

delegateeAddresses.description: Addresses responsible for executing the app's operations on behalf of Vincent App Users
